item.description:

Yesterday, Cardi B casually and calmly announced that she and husband Offset had split. "Things just haven't been working out between us for a long time," she said in an Instagram video. "It's nobody's fault. I guess, like, we grew out of love. But we're not together anymore." They appeared to remain on good terms, with Cardi stressing that they were "really good friends" and "really good business partners," but an Instagram post from a model has people wondering if there's more to this split that meets the eye. item.title: Cardi B Shares Baby's Picture Hours After Offset Split - International Business Times
item.description:
Cardi B Shares Baby's Picture Hours After Offset Split  International Business Times

Cardi B has finally shared the first picture of her daughter after shielding her baby from the paparazzi for months. Millions of fans have already reacted to Cardi B's baby's cute picture online. The post is also significant because it came just a few hours after the rapper announced that she is splitting from Offset. “My heart,” Cardi B wrote on the Instagram post of her daughter’s picture. In the photo, the baby is surrounded by pink. Her headband, bow and dress are all in pink. Her clothing has the name of the baby, Kulture. The post has over 8.5 million likes as of this writing, and fan...

Ray J -- who earlier that evening hit up the Lakers game -- hopes Cardi and Offset get back together because he's adamant they belong together. item.description:

Cardi B took a break from the drama of her split with husband Offset for a little dancing and music in Miami. Just a day after the rapper announced that she and Offset were calling it quits, she appeared at the annual Art Basel festival to host an event at E11EVEN MIAMI, reports People, though people at the appearance say the new mom seemed down. The 26-year-old appeared in a little black dress with a colorful rainbow wig at the club, showing up around 3 a.m. Thursday morning. What was missing was her $500,000 eight-carat engagement ring that she’s been wearing for over a year since she and...

item.title: Cardi B Faces Down Pissed-Off Judge in Strip-Club Brawl Case - The Daily Beast
item.description:
Cardi B Faces Down Pissed-Off Judge in Strip-Club Brawl Case  The Daily Beast

Raymond Hall/Getty Cardi B arrived at Queens Criminal Court on Friday with what could best be described as an air of dour glamour. The “Bodak Yellow” rapper, whose given name is Belcalis Almanzar, sported long rainbow hair (a la Tekshi 6ix9ine’s dye job), a black fur-collared jacket, and Louboutin booties. She had crystal-encrusted nails that sparkled with each minuscule hand movement. She donned a wide-brimmed, Fedora-esque hat upon entering court, as well as large sunglasses, almost reminiscent of the old Hollywood vibe of her Marilyn Monroe getup when she surrendered to cops in October f...

item.title: Judge: Cardi B must not contact strip club melee victims - The Associated Press
item.description:
Judge: Cardi B must not contact strip club melee victims  The Associated Press

NEW YORK (AP) — Cardi B must not contact, in person or through social media, the victims of a melee she was involved in at a New York strip club, a judge ordered Friday. The platinum rapper appeared in court in New York City after a summons was issued Oct. 1 for misdemeanor reckless endangerment and assault. Her lawyer has said she didn't harm anybody. Police said Cardi B and her entourage were at the club around 3 a.m. when she argued with a 23-year-old bartender. They say a fight broke out during which chairs, bottles and hookah pipes were thrown, slightly injuring the woman and another e...

item.title: Cardi B Released Without Bail In Rescheduled Court Appearance - Refinery29
item.description:
Cardi B Released Without Bail In Rescheduled Court Appearance  Refinery29

Cardi B made an appearance in court Friday morning after missing her scheduled date earlier this week. The judge warned that a warrant for her arrest would be issued if she didn't show, but the rapper, who recently announced her split from Offset, dodged photographers bright and early to attend her Queens hearing. According to TMZ, she was released without bail but was told not to have any contact with the victims — and that includes social media posts. UPDATED: This story was originally published on December 3, 2018 at 4:15 p.m. From the birth of her daughter to the release of Invasion of ...

A rainbow-tressed Cardi B appeared in Queens Criminal Court on Friday morning, narrowly avoiding a warrant for her arrest. "Am I this famous?" she reportedly said, with paparazzi documenting her arrival. The platinum-selling rapper, whose given name is Belcalis Marlenis Almanzar, had an arraignment appearance related to an incident at Angels Strip Club in Flushing in August. A pair of sisters who are bartenders, Baddie Gi and Jade (real names Rachel Wattley, 21, and Sarah Wattley, 23), claim that Cardi B ordered her entourage to beat them up. item.title: Cardi B Appears in Court for Strip Club Brawl - Rap-Up
item.description:
Cardi B Appears in Court for Strip Club Brawl  Rap-Up

Four days after facing a potential arrest for skipping a hearing, Cardi B appeared in a New York courtroom Friday (Dec. 7) for her alleged involvement in a strip club brawl. During the August incident at Angels Strip Club in Queens, New York, Cardi allegedly ordered an attack on two of the venue’s female bartenders, one of whom was rumored to have have sex with Offset. The rapper’s crew allegedly threw bottles, chairs, and a hookah at the bartenders, resulting in injuries. She was charged with two misdemeanor counts of reckless endangerment and one misdemeanor count of assault. Defendant Be...

item.description:

Donning Louboutin heels, a black fur coat and a bold new hairstyle, Cardi B arrived at the Queens Criminal Court in New York City to face assault and reckless endangerment charges over a strip club brawl she was allegedly involved in earlier this year. The rapper, whose real name is Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar, smiled to a herd of paparazzi as she entered the court and left shortly after, at one point jokingly asking, "Am I famous?" item.description:
Kodak Black is Dying To Live  FanSided

Kodak Black announces official release date for 'Dying To Live.' Kodak Black has been keeping himself busy in a positive way; churning out new music since his release from Broward County jail in August of 2018 after serving seven months. The up-and coming Florida rapper was on the rise until his career was put on hold stemming from charges of possession of a weapon and marijuana. The twenty-one year old who dropped out of high school was able to earn his GED while locked up behind bars and decrease his sentence of twelve months to seven when the judge awarded him time served. Lil wayne) on Thursday, and for those who missed it, it included two very important cameos. item.title: Cardi B Released without Bail After Showing for Court to Avoid Warrant for Arrest - TMZ
item.description:
Cardi B Released without Bail After Showing for Court to Avoid Warrant for Arrest  TMZ

6:40 AM PT -- The hearing's over. Prosecutors wanted Cardi's bail to be set at $2,500, but the judge released her with no bail and said he didn't think the rapper was a flight risk. The judge DID give Cardi a stern warning to have NO contact whatsoever with Baddie Gi and Jade. After issuing protective orders for the alleged victims, the judge told Cardi "no contact" includes making threats or comments on social media about the bartenders. She's scheduled to be back in court next month. Cardi B's not messing with the judge in NYC, she showed up bright and early for her court date ... dodging...

item.title: Cardi B and Offset Relationship Timeline Before Split - Newsweek
item.description:
Cardi B and Offset Relationship Timeline Before Split  Newsweek

After one year of marriage, Cardi B and Offset called it quits. The “Money” rapper took to Instagram to announce their split on Tuesday night. “So everybody been bugging me and everything and you know I’ve been trying to work things out with my baby father for a hot minute now,” Cardi said. “We are really good friends and we are really good business partners—you know he’s always somebody that I run to talk to, and we got a lot of love for each other but things just haven’t been working out between us for a long time.” Cardi—whose real name is Belcalis Almánzar—married Offset—whose real name...

item.title: Cardi B Posts First Photo Of Baby Kulture & The Internet Kan't Deal - Refinery29
item.description:
Cardi B Posts First Photo Of Baby Kulture & The Internet Kan't Deal  Refinery29

Since giving birth to her first child with husband Offset in July — named Kulture Kiari Cephus — Cardi B has taken a page out of Beyoncé’s book and kept the newborn completely out of the spotlight. There have been no pictures, no videos, no nothing. All that changed Wednesday when the “Money” rapper shared the first-ever photo of her 4-month-old baby girl. And honestly, the internet kan’t handle how kute she is. Summer Bunni is getting some viral attention, though likely not the kind she had hoped. The aspiring music video actress has become something of a pariah of social media amid reports that she was the “other woman” who led to the split between Cardi B and Offset. As the pair split, some text messages surfaced showing Summer and Offset planning a tryst with another woman. And to throw some salt in the wounds, People magazine reported that Summer Bunni appeared in a music video for Cardi’s musical rival, Nicki Minaj. “In July, Nicki, who has been feuding with the Bodak Yellow rapper since thei...

item.description:
Video: Kodak Black feat. Travis Scott & Offset – ‘ZEZE’  Rap-Up

This that Z sh*t. Kodak Black celebrates Black Friday by unleashing a video for his hit “ZEZE” featuring Travis Scott and Offset. Directed by Travis, the comedic clip is a behind-the-scenes look at a rap video shoot, with money, cars, and lots of ass. Clad in a ski mask, Offset appears against the green screen backdrops including a volcanic eruption and a frozen tundra, while Travis runs from a giant ass. As drama unfolds on set and budgets are cut, Kodak dances on top of a car before the trio comes together in the final scene. “ZEZE” was released last month and debuted at No. 1 on the Bill...

item.title: Cardi B reacts to Grammy nominations whilst leaving court: “This is not how I expected to find out I am nominated for a Grammy” - NME Live
item.description:
Cardi B reacts to Grammy nominations whilst leaving court: “This is not how I expected to find out I am nominated for a Grammy”  NME Live

"Need a do over" Cardi B performs at Z100's Jingle Ball 2018 at Madison Square Garden on December 7, 2018 in New York City. Cardi B discovered that she was nominated for a Grammy yesterday moments after leaving court. The ‘Bodak Yellow’ star was appearing in court in relation to an incident where she allegedly attacked two bartenders at Angels Strip Club on August 29. Cardi B was arrested and charged on October 1 on suspicion of assault and reckless endangerment. - Read more: After a stiff start, Cardi B’s live return is a riot of personality, power, and passion Yesterday (December 7), Card...

item.title: Reason Behind Cardi B, Offset Breakup Revealed - International Business Times
item.description:
Reason Behind Cardi B, Offset Breakup Revealed  International Business Times

Cardi B and Offset’s split was fueled by numerous speculations, including the latter’s alleged infidelity that involved female rapper Cuban Doll and another woman named Summer Bunni. On Wednesday, TMZ published an image of what appears to be leaked text messages between Offset and Bunni. The conversation the they had alluded to a scheduled three-way that the male rapper planned. Based on the leaked image, the conversation happened on June 28. It’s interesting to note that Cardi B gave birth to daughter Kulture Kiari Cephus on July 10, just a couple of weeks after the text messages about the...

item.title: Cardi B's Post-Breakup Glow-Up Is Coming & I Can't Wait - Refinery29
item.description:
Cardi B's Post-Breakup Glow-Up Is Coming & I Can't Wait  Refinery29

When I first heard the rumors that Cardi B and Offset were dating last year, I said a prayer to the trap gods and goddesses to bless their union. I couldn’t think of two people in the hip-hop space more suited for each other, and that meant something. For Black girls who grew up reading urban fiction novels like The Coldest Winter Ever, a hip-hop power couple is just as endearing to us as A Christmas Prince is to white millennial women. A Black love story set against a backdrop of Billboard hits, foreign cars, and expensive jewelry is a fantasy snatched straight from my 16-year-old mind. Wa...

item.title: Snooki pregnant with baby No. 3 - CNN
item.description:
Snooki pregnant with baby No. 3  CNN

The family of Jionni LaValle, Lorenzo Lavalle, Giovanna LaValle and Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi, shown here in September 2015 in Long Valley, New Jersey, will be growing. The "Jersey Shore" star announced on Thanksgiving that she is pregnant with baby number three. Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images Kenya Moore and husband Marc Daly welcomed their first child, a daughter named Brooklyn Doris, in November. Moore, 47, announced during "The Real Housewives of Atlanta" reunion show in April that she and Daly were expecting. She surprised fans when she quietly married Daly in June 2017 during a private, is...

item.title: Cardi B Just Shared the First Photo of Kulture, and She's Too Precious For Words - POPSUGAR
item.description:
Cardi B Just Shared the First Photo of Kulture, and She's Too Precious For Words  POPSUGAR

Cardi B just shared the first Instagram photo of her daughter Kulture Kiari Cephus, and oh boy, she is so cute! Despite her many opportunities and awards over the past year, the "I Like It" singer calls motherhood her proudest achievement, and this picture makes it clear to see why. Cardi has been very protective over sharing pictures of her 4-month-old, making her Instagram post on Dec. 5 an adorable rarity. The 26-year-old singer welcomed Kulture with husband Offset back in July. While the couple married over a year ago, Cardi shocked fans when she announced their split Tuesday. The reaso...

item.title: Why You Might Not Want to Copy Paris Hilton and Cardi B's Engagement Ring - Brides
item.description:
Why You Might Not Want to Copy Paris Hilton and Cardi B's Engagement Ring  Brides

It might not seem like heiress-turned-nightclub DJ Paris Hilton and rapper Cardi B have a lot in common, but the two are surprisingly similar. Both ladies are New York City natives and former reality TV stars. They both make majorrr money moves (millions of dollars in net worth) and work in the music industry. But we're not here to give you a Venn diagram of their lives—we're here to talk about their twin pear-shaped diamond engagement rings that they both returned after calling it quits on their relationships in the past month. Yes, we're talking about the curse of the $500,000+ pear-shape...

item.title: Cardi B Announces Split From Offset - International Business Times
item.description:
Cardi B Announces Split From Offset  International Business Times

Cardi B took to social media to announce her split from husband Offset on Tuesday. The "Drip" singer, whose real name is Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar, posted a video saying the two “are not together anymore.” In the video, she said they are really good friends, business partners and have a lot of love for each other, however, things haven’t been working out between them. She added the split was nobody’s fault and that they grew out of love. "It might take time to get a divorce and I'm always going to have a lot of love for him,” she concluded. A lot of fans expressed their disappointment post...

item.title: A few Vogue moments in Hip-Hop - FanSided
item.description:
A few Vogue moments in Hip-Hop  FanSided

Though it was boredom that led me onto the Vogue YouTube channel, it was entertainment that held me hostage in an all-nighter clip marathon. As a result, I now have a few of the iconic magazine's best moments in hip-hop to share. No matter the language spoken, we all have heard the word 'vogue' which simply means style. Not only was the term extremely trendy in the 1990's when Madonna wrote a song paying homage to the influential movers and shakers under Vogue's trend-setting ways, but under the leadership of editor-in-chief Anna Wintour, the magazine flourished in that era. The fashion m...

item.title: Watch: Cardi B Announces Split from Offset - Newsweek
item.description:
Watch: Cardi B Announces Split from Offset  Newsweek

Rapper Cardi B announced that she and husband Offset of the Migos are no longer "together" in an Instagram posted early Wednesday morning. Cardi B, whose real name is Belcalis Almánzar and Offset, born Kiari Cephus, have had an on-and-off relationship since 2017 and were secretly married in September 2017, which was revealed publicly when TMZ obtained a photo of their marriage license in June 2018. The couple has one child, daughter Kulture Kiari Cephus, who was born on July 10, 2018. "So everybody been buggin' me and everything and you know I been trying to work things out with my baby fat...

item.title: Cardi B Just Revealed She and Offset Are Divorcing After 1 Year of Marriage - Glamour
item.description:
Cardi B Just Revealed She and Offset Are Divorcing After 1 Year of Marriage  Glamour

It's time to add another couple to the ever-growing list of major celebrity breakups this year. Cardi B took to her Instagram—because, of course she did—last night to announce that she and husband Offset have parted ways after a year of marriage. She posted a short video addressing the matter with the caption, "There you go...peace and love." "So, everybody been bugging me and everything. And you know, I been trying to work things out with my baby father for a hot minute now," Cardi said. "We’re really good friends, and we’re really good business partners, but things just haven’t been worki...

item.title: Cardi B announces split from husband Offset: 'I guess we fell out of love' - The Independent
item.description:
Cardi B announces split from husband Offset: 'I guess we fell out of love'  The Independent

Cardi B has revealed she has split from her husband Offset, in a video announcement posted on Instagram. I’ve been trying to work things out with my baby father… we’re really good friends, we’re really good business partners and he’s always somebody I run to, to talk to, and we got a lot of love for each other,” the rapper said in the video. “But things just haven’t been working out between us for a long time, and it’s nobody’s fault, I guess we fell out of love," she continued. item.title: Cardi B Challenges Offset to Rap Battle - Rap-Up
item.description:
Cardi B Challenges Offset to Rap Battle  Rap-Up

Who want the smoke? Cardi B is challenging Offset to a rap battle. The “Bodak Yellow” rapper took to Instagram to challenge her husband to a rap battle, which will take place Nov. 29 at 12 p.m. on the video app TikTok. “What’s poppin’ husband? I challenge you to a rap battle,” said Cardi in her video. The loser will have to pay to decorate their homes for the holidays. “Whoever loses gotta buy all the Christmas decorations, all of them,” added Cardi. “The one in New York, the one in Atlanta too.” And Cardi is not afraid of a little friendly competition. “Are you scared of wifey?” she asked ...

item.title: Offset Blames Cardi B Fans for Divorce After 1 Year of Marriage - STYLECASTER
item.description:
Offset Blames Cardi B Fans for Divorce After 1 Year of Marriage  STYLECASTER

Cardi B broke the internet’s heart on Monday night when she announced that she and Offset are divorcing after one year of marriage. In a video on her Instagram, the 26-year-old rapper explained that the couple’s divorce is “nobody’s fault” and they simply “fell out of love.” “And it’s nobody fault. I guess we grew out of love but we are not together anymore,” she said. “I don’t know, it might take time to get a divorce and I’m going to always have a lot of love for him because he is my daughter’s father.” But is that really what happened? After Cardi’s video, Offset took to her comments wit...

item.title: Video: Takeoff – ‘Casper’ - Rap-Up
item.description:
Video: Takeoff – ‘Casper’  Rap-Up

Takeoff takes off into outer space in the video for “Casper,” the latest release from his debut album The Last Rocket. In the futuristic clip, dubbed “Last Rocket Mission: The Quest for Selene,” the Migos MC plays an astronaut in the year 2092. He explores a planet filled with beautiful ladies while in pursuit of his perfect woman, and ghost rides a Rolls-Royce Wraith while defying gravity. “The way I ghost ride the Wraith / Thought you would’ve seen Casper,” he raps in the Gabriel Hart-directed clip. The 808 Mafia-produced “Casper” is the second visual off The Last Rocket following “Last M...

item.title: Cardi B achieves ‘childhood dream’ of buying her mother a house - The Independent
item.description:
Cardi B achieves ‘childhood dream’ of buying her mother a house  The Independent

Cardi B has achieved her “childhood dream” of buying her mother a house. The 26-year-old rapper said it was the “happiest day of my life” as she gave fans a video tour of the property in her home state of New York. Cardi B, who was brought up in the Bronx, admitted she was “emotional” and had been crying as she walked fans through the mansion, which features its own gym. - Read more Nicki Minaj addresses Cardi B fight at New York Fashion Week She captioned the post on Instagram: “Stay down till you come up! It’s always been a dream to buy my mother a house. “Last year I was so thirsty to bu...

item.title: Cardi B Shares First Photo of Her Baby Girl Kulture - Jezebel
item.description:
Cardi B Shares First Photo of Her Baby Girl Kulture  Jezebel

Image: Getty Cardi B has for the first time released a photograph of her and Offset’s freakin’ adorable 5-month-old baby girl Kulture. I think Kulture likes pink. [Page Six] …..Meanwhile, this Cardi-Offset divorce business is getting messy. TMZ reports leaked texts allegedly sent by Offset to Summer Bunni suggest he was trying to arrange a threeway with her and rapper Cuban Doll. The texts appear to have been sent on June 28, a couple weeks before Cardi B gave birth to their daughter Kulture. TMZ reports screenshots of the texts leaked a few hours before Cardi B announced on Tuesday night t...

item.title: Cardi B’s private jet forced to make emergency landing - NME Live
item.description:
Cardi B’s private jet forced to make emergency landing  NME Live

The rapper was flying from LA to New York when it was forced to make an unexpected stop Cardi B Cardi B‘s private jet was forced to make an emergency landing earlier today (November 26) en route from Los Angeles to New York. The plane was reportedly grounded in Chicago after one of its passengers required medical attention. TMZ reports the person who became ill was not a member of the rapper’s crew. Cardi B responded to the incident on her Instagram story, saying: “I’m stuck in Chicago. We had to do an emergency landing in Chicago. Let me tell you something… I’m not taking no more fucking j...

item.title: Cardi B No-Showed To A Court Appearance And The Judge Is Giving Her Another Chance - BuzzFeed News
item.description:
Cardi B No-Showed To A Court Appearance And The Judge Is Giving Her Another Chance  BuzzFeed News

Rapper Cardi B was a no-show Monday at her arraignment on charges of assault and reckless endangerment that she racked up in at a New York City strip club in October. The star’s lawyer, Jeff Kerns, attended the court proceeding in her place. He told the judge that, while Cardi, whose real names is Belcalis Almánzar, was aware of the court date, there were extenuating circumstances which made it difficult for the artist to attend the hearing. After Kerns stressed that his client hadn’t had a history of criminal behavior, the judge adjourned the proceeding for Dec. 7 at 11 a.m., giving Cardi ...
